concept.title: 522.1003-7 Questions concerning applicability of the Act.

conbody.p: The contracting officer may submit a question regarding the applicability of the Act to assigned legal counsel. If the question cannot be answered, the agency labor advisor will forward it to the Administrator, Wage and Hour Division.
